name: Paraglide Africa
about: Paraglide Africa is a premier paragliding school based in South Africa, offering a comprehensive range of services including tandem flights, instructional courses, and bespoke flying tours. Our school is approved by the South African Civil Aviation Authority (SACAA) and is committed to providing a safe and controlled learning environment. With experienced instructors like Wayne Heuer, who brings an abundance of knowledge and passion to the training, we ensure that our students receive top-notch education. Our courses are designed to cater to all skill levels, from beginners to advanced flyers, and we emphasize both theoretical knowledge and practical flying skills. Whether you're looking for an exhilarating tandem experience or aiming to become a certified paraglider, Paraglide Africa is your ideal choice for a memorable and safe flying experience. Join us to discover the thrill of paragliding in one of the world's most scenic locations.
